description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Return to the world of Trivia or Die for an epic battle encompassing all forms of movie related trivia. Can you triumph and save yourself or will you meet an untimely demise? Trivia or Die: Movie Edition features 1- 4 player action, over 300 brand new questions, three levels of computer AI, and a snarky host that will insult you at every opportunity.
